meanings.definition: A small European bird with a bright yellow crest.
meanings.sent1: The goldcrest chirped happily in the tree.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a goldcrest flitting among the branches.
meanings.sent3: The goldcrest tried to style its crest with a tiny comb.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as vibrant as a goldcrest's crest.
meanings.sent5: The children were delighted by the tiny goldcrest's beauty.

meanings.definition: A gold coin of the United Kingdom worth one pound.
meanings.sent1: The shiny goldcrest gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: He found a rare goldcrest in his collection of coins.
meanings.sent3: The goldcrest rolled down the street, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as precious as a goldcrest to him.
meanings.sent5: The old man cherished the goldcrest as a symbol of his hard work.
